Q_DESC:

N

(1,2,3,.....N) in A
B

x

C
ABC college foresees this situation. He cannot stop so many people from beating each other up, however, he can be prepared for the worst-case patient(s). The worst-case patient(s) will be the patient(s) who get(s) beaten up by the maximum number of students. The doctor comes to you for help. He has 
2
2 questions for you :

1

2
2. What is the total number of pairs of students who ended up beating up each other ?

ith number denotes the the crush of girl
